title: How RBI's repo rate hike has pushed small finance banks and private banks to offer as high as 7% on... - Moneycontrol
content: How RBI's repo rate hike has pushed small finance banks and private banks to offer as high as 7% on...  Moneycontrol
description: Several banks have sharply hiked interest rates on fixed deposits across the tenures after the Reserve Bank of India raised repo rate by 40 basis points in this month.
